title: Generative AI Concept Lab
tagline: Rapid prototyping of AI-assisted creative workflows for web, print, and motion teams.

context.problem: Generative AI design is where the industry is headed. The line between design and engineering is dissolving fast, and staying relevant now means understanding both. This work came from deliberately leaning into that shift. Learning the tools, testing the limits, tracking the trends, and actively integrating AI into real creative production instead of watching the wave from the shore.
The goal was simple:: Build real-world fluency, not surface-level experiments.
Merge creative direction with technical execution in a way that actually ships.
Skepticism around AI adoption across stakeholders

solution.approach: Built a practical, hands-on generative AI workflow focused on control, quality, and production readiness. Instead of treating AI as a gimmick, it was developed as a design system extension. Prototyping rapidly, validating outputs against brand standards, and pushing assets directly into motion and layout pipelines.

gallery.alt: Fluffy white sword-bearing creatures gathered in a sunlit forest
Hyperreal yellow fox cub with oversized eyes on a colorful rug
Abstract overlapping geometric pattern in orange, teal, black, and white
Blue iris collage blending urban decay, coastline, and floating spheres
Portrait with glowing orange particle branches erupting from the head
Close-up of a fluffy white creature with big blue eyes and sharp teeth
Glowing translucent blue crystalline organism resembling coral
White winged horse galloping down a sunset path with glowing feathers

impact.label: Cycle Time
impact.description: Compressed creative ideation from 3 days to under 24 hours.

impact.label: Cost Offset
impact.description: Reduced outsourced concept spend across quarterly campaigns.

impact.label: Confidence
impact.description: Leadership approved scaling AI workflows across design pods.

process.title: Prompt Library Development
process.description: Codified prompt libraries aligned to brand language and mood boards

process.title: Quality Assurance
process.description: Developed QA checklist for bias mitigation and accessibility compliance

process.title: Pipeline Integration
process.description: Integrated generative outputs into Figma and After Effects pipelines

process.title: Automation & Workflow
process.description: Automated versioning and approvals through Notion + Slack integration

reflection.learning: AI accelerates human creativity when paired with strong guardrails, transparent review, and brand ownership.
